palette.title: The Fifth Sense
palette.description: The name's kinda lame but "sensational challenge" wouldn't fit, so... Sight: Movies! Maybe this is a cheap answer, but as I've said before, I love to watch movies. A visually striking movie is my favorite thing to look at. Touch: Hugs- I think almost anyone can agree here. Hugs are pretty darn awesome. Smell: I love the smell of Downy. It reminds of me home and is always relaxing. Taste: I like fruity-tasting things. Smoothies, lemonade, fruit snacks, pretty much anything like that. Sound: the piano is my favorite instrument. It's so expressive, but in a subtle way. I'm always in the mood for some piano.
